languages.text: "З-звездное Сиятельство, мы изо всех сил старались организовать торжество, достойное Звездных Господ. Но, признаться, узнали о вашем прибытии так поздно! Всего один бездарный астроплюй у меня и остался. Пришлось готовиться впопыхах. Но все — все, чем славна Тассера! — пред вами, прошу вас..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Голос губернатора дрожит, как задетая перстнем струна.{/n} "В-ваше Сиятельство, мы изо всех сил старались организовать торжество, достойное звездных господ. Но, признаться, узнали о вашем прибытии так поздно! Всего один бездарный астроплюй у меня и остался — и тот путает год с лунарием. Пришлось готовиться впопыхах. Но все — все, чем славна Тессера! — пред вами, прошу вас..."

languages.text: "N-now, Your Celestial Highness, we truly tried our best to put together a celebration worthy of our honoured visitors. But the news of your coming reached us so late! All I have left is a single talentless Astropath. We had to rush the preparations. Nevertheless, we have managed to put everything, everything Thassera is proud of on display here for you! I must ask—"
languages.original_text: "З-звездное Сиятельство, мы изо всех сил старались организовать торжество, достойное Звездных Господ. Но, признаться, узнали о вашем прибытии так поздно! Всего один бездарный астроплюй у меня и остался. Пришлось готовиться впопыхах. Но все — все, чем славна Тассера! — пред вами, прошу вас..."

traits.locale_text: "N-now, Your {mf|Celestial Lordship|Celestial Ladyship}, we truly tried our best to put together a celebration worthy of our honoured visitors. But the news of your coming reached us so late! All I have left is a single talentless Astrochap. We had to rush the preparations. Nevertheless, we've managed to put everything, everything Thassera is proud of here on display for you! I must ask—"

"N-now, Your {mf|Celestial Lordship|Celestial Ladyship}, we truly tried our best to put together a celebration worthy of our honoured visitors. But the news of your coming reached us so late! "N-now, Your Celestial Highness, we truly tried our best to put together a celebration worthy of our honoured visitors. But the news of your coming reached us so late! All I have left is a single talentless Astropath. We had to rush the preparations. Nevertheless, we have managed to put everything, everything Thassera is proud of on display here for you! I must ask—"

languages.text: “当……当然，来自上界的大人。我们真的尽了我们最大的努力，迎接像您这么尊贵的客人。可我们这里只有一位不怎么样的星语者，消息传得实在是太慢了！所以我们不得不加急准备。但即便如此，我们还是把塔瑟拉引以为傲的一切都呈现在了您面前！我必须恳请您……”
languages.original_text: "N-now, Your Celestial Highness, we truly tried our best to put together a celebration worthy of our honoured visitors. But the news of your coming reached us so late! All I have left is a single talentless Astropath. We had to rush the preparations. Nevertheless, we have managed to put everything, everything Thassera is proud of on display here for you! I must ask—"

traits.locale_text: “当……当然，来自上界的大人。我们真的尽了我们最大的努力，迎接像您这么尊贵的客人。可我们这里只有一位不怎么样的星语者，消息传得实在是太慢了！所以我们不得不加急准备。但即便如此，我们还是把塔瑟拉引以为傲的一切都呈现在了您面前！我必须恳请您……”
“当……当然，来自上界的大人。我们真的尽了我们最大的努力，迎接像您这么尊贵的客人。可消息传得实在是太慢了，我们不久前才刚刚得知您要驾临此地！于是我们不得不加快进度，而且这里只剩下一支荒腔走板的太空乐队。但即便如此，我们还是把塔瑟拉引以为傲的一切都呈现在了您面前！我必须恳请您……”

languages.text: 「で、ですが、天の閣下…私たちは尊きお客様にふさわしい祝典をどうにかご用意しようと、本当に全力を尽くしたのです。しかしながら、ご来訪の報せがあまりにも遅く届きまして！残っていたのは、無能な感応通信官一人だけで…準備も急ごしらえになってしまいました。それでも、タッセーラが誇るすべてを、こうして何とかお見せできるよう整えたのです！どうかお願いします―」
languages.original_text: "N-now, Your Celestial Highness, we truly tried our best to put together a celebration worthy of our honoured visitors. But the news of your coming reached us so late! All I have left is a single talentless Astropath. We had to rush the preparations. Nevertheless, we have managed to put everything, everything Thassera is proud of on display here for you! I must ask—"

traits.locale_text: 「で、ですが、天の閣下…私たちは尊きお客様にふさわしい祝典をどうにかご用意しようと、本当に全力を尽くしたのです。しかしながら、ご来訪の報せがあまりにも遅く届きまして！残っていたのは、無能なアストロチャップ一人だけで…準備も急ごしらえになってしまいました。それでも、タッセーラが誇るすべてを、こうして何とかお見せできるよう整えたのです！どうかお願いします―」
「で、ですが、天の閣下…私たちは尊きお客様にふさわしい祝典をどうにかご用意しようと、本当に全力を尽くしたのです。しかしながら、ご来訪の報せがあまりにも遅く届きまして！残っていたのは、無能なアストロチャップ一人だけで…準備も急ごしらえになってしまいました。それでも、タッセーラが誇るすべてを、こうして何とかお見せできるよう整えたのです！どうかお願いします―」

languages.text: «V-verá, mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial, le juro que hemos hecho lo posible por organizar una celebración digna de tan ilustres visitantes. ¡Pero supimos demasiado tarde de su llegada! Lo único que me queda es un Astrópata sin talento. Hemos tenido que apresurar los preparativos. ¡Pese a todo, hemos logrado exponer aquí todo el orgullo de Thassera! Debo pedirle que...».
languages.original_text: "N-now, Your Celestial Highness, we truly tried our best to put together a celebration worthy of our honoured visitors. But the news of your coming reached us so late! All I have left is a single talentless Astropath. We had to rush the preparations. Nevertheless, we have managed to put everything, everything Thassera is proud of on display here for you! I must ask—"

traits.locale_text: «V-verá, mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial, le juro que hemos hecho lo posible por organizar una celebración digna de tan ilustres visitantes. ¡Pero supimos demasiado tarde de su llegada! Lo único que me queda es un Astrópata sin talento. Hemos tenido que apresurar los preparativos. ¡Pese a todo, hemos logrado exponer aquí todo el orgullo de Thassera! Debo pedirle que...».

«V-verá, mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial, le juro que hemos hecho lo posible por organizar una celebración digna de tan ilustres visitantes. ¡Pero supimos demasiado tarde de su llegada! Lo único que me queda es un astropatán sin talento. Hemos tenido que apresurar los preparativos. ¡Pese a todo, hemos logrado exponer aquí todo el orgullo de Thassera! Debo pedirle que...».

languages.text: "Ş... Şey Semavi Efendimiz... Onurlu ziyaretçilerimize layık bir kutlama hazırlamak için gerçekten elimizden gelenin en iyisini yaptık. Geliş haberiniz bize çok geç ulaştı! Elimde bir tane yeteneksiz Astropat var. Hazırlıkları aceleye getirmek zorunda kaldık. Yine de Thassera'nın gurur duyduğu her şeyi sizin için burada sergilemeyi başardık! Sormak zorundayım..."
languages.original_text: "N-now, Your Celestial Highness, we truly tried our best to put together a celebration worthy of our honoured visitors. But the news of your coming reached us so late! All I have left is a single talentless Astropath. We had to rush the preparations. Nevertheless, we have managed to put everything, everything Thassera is proud of on display here for you! I must ask—"

traits.locale_text: "Ş... Şey Semavi Efendimiz... Onurlu ziyaretçilerimize layık bir kutlama hazırlamak için gerçekten elimizden gelenin en iyisini yaptık. Geliş haberiniz bize çok geç ulaştı! Elimde bir tane yeteneksiz Astropat var. Hazırlıkları aceleye getirmek zorunda kaldık. Yine de Thassera'nın gurur duyduğu her şeyi sizin için burada sergilemeyi başardık! Sormak zorundayım..."

"Ş... Şey Semavi Efendimiz... Onurlu ziyaretçilerimize layık bir kutlama hazırlamak için gerçekten elimizden gelenin en iyisini yaptık. Geliş haberiniz bize çok geç ulaştı! Elimde bir tane yeteneksiz Astropapaz var. Hazırlıkları aceleye getirmek zorunda kaldık. Yine de Thassera'nın gurur duyduğu her şeyi sizin için burada sergilemeyi başardık! Sormak zorundayım..."

languages.text: « Nous avons vraiment fait de notre mieux pour organiser des réjouissances dignes de nos illustres visiteurs, Votre Altesse Célestissime. Mais la nouvelle de votre arrivée nous est parvenue si tardivement ! Tout ce qu'il me reste est un unique astropathe dépourvu de talent. Nous avons dû hâter les préparatifs, mais absolument tout ce qui fait la fierté de Thassera n'en a pas moins été rassemblé ici pour vous ! Je dois vous demander... »
languages.original_text: "N-now, Your Celestial Highness, we truly tried our best to put together a celebration worthy of our honoured visitors. But the news of your coming reached us so late! All I have left is a single talentless Astropath. We had to rush the preparations. Nevertheless, we have managed to put everything, everything Thassera is proud of on display here for you! I must ask—"

Mais la nouvelle de votre arrivée nous est parvenue si tardivement ! Tout ce qu'il me reste est un unique astropathe dépourvu de talent. Nous avons dû hâter les préparatifs, mais absolument tout ce qui fait la fierté de Thassera n'en a pas moins été rassemblé ici pour vous ! Je dois vous demander... »

« Nous avons vraiment fait de notre mieux pour organiser des réjouissances dignes de nos illustres visiteurs, Votre Altesse Célestissime. Mais la nouvelle de votre arrivée nous est parvenue si tardivement ! Tout ce qu'il me reste est un unique astrochap dépourvu de talent. Nous avons dû hâter les préparatifs, mais absolument tout ce qui fait la fierté de Thassera n'en a pas moins été rassemblé ici pour vous ! Je dois vous demander... »

languages.text: "A-aber Eure himmlische Hoheit, wir haben wirklich alles daran gesetzt, eine Feierlichkeit zu organisieren, die unserer geschätzten Gäste würdig ist. Aber wird haben erst spät von Eurem Kommen erfahren! Alles, was ich noch habe, ist ein talentloser Astropath. Wir hatten kaum Zeit für die Vorbereitungen. Dennoch ist es uns gelungen, alles, worauf Thassera stolz ist, hier für Euch zu präsentieren! Ich muss Euch bitten ..."

All I have left is a single talentless Astropath. We had to rush the preparations. Nevertheless, we have managed to put everything, everything Thassera is proud of on display here for you! I must ask—"

Aber wird haben erst spät von Eurem Kommen erfahren! Alles, was ich noch habe, ist ein talentloser Astronaut. Wir hatten kaum Zeit für die Vorbereitungen. Dennoch ist es uns gelungen, alles, worauf Thassera stolz ist, hier für Euch zu präsentieren! Ich muss Euch bitten ..."
